item.title: Arch Linux Installation
item.description: Download ISO file https://www.archlinux.org/download/ https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/archlinux/iso/ Prepare an installation medium 1dd bs=4M if=path/to/archlinux.iso of=/dev/sdb status=progress oflag=sync Boot the live environment Connect Network 1iwctl 2device list 3station [device] scan 4station [device] get-networks 5station [device] connect SSID 6 7# Check 8ip address 9 10# Update the system clock 11timedatectl set-ntp true 12timedatectl status Partition the disks 1lsblk -l 2 3cgdisk /dev/sda 4 5# Format 6# EFI `ef00` 7# Linux `8300` 8# SWAP `8200` 9mkfs.ext4 10mkfs.vfat 11mkswap 12 13# Mount 14mount /dev/sda3 /mnt 15mkdir /mnt/boot 16mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/boot 17swapon /dev/sda2 Edit Mirrorlist 1vim /etc/pacman.
